scope: Support innovative hydrogen projects that help shape the federal hydrogen strategy
title: Clean Hydrogen for Clean Industry
description: With the "Clean Hydrogen for Clean Industry" project call, the federal government aims to support innovative hydrogen projects that help shape the federal hydrogen strategy. This call aims to promote research into, development and demonstration of technologies and infrastructure for the production and use of hydrogen and hydrogen derivatives with a particular focus on projects that are in the practical development phase, as long as the projects fall within federal competences and respect the principles of "do no significant harm."

scope: Los proyectos de I+D vinculados a los PERTES Aeroespacial y de Salud de Vanguardia son proyectos de investigación y desarrollo empresarial de carácter aplicado para la creación o mejora significativa de un proceso productivo, producto o servicio. Los proyectos deben demostrar un aspecto tecnológico diferencial sobre las tecnologías existentes en el mercado. Los proyectos de I+D pueden comprender tanto actividades de investigación industrial como de desarrollo experimental. Los proyectos de I+D son presentados por una única empresa.

Do you have an innovative idea that can lead to a successful business, with still some challenges to overcome in developing this innovation? If yes, you can contact us both for advice and financial aid

title: Co-financing for soil remediation
description:
Private individuals, companies and public authorities can apply to OVAM for a subsidy for the remediation of serious historical pollution. The subsidy rate is 35% or 50%, depending on whether or not the applicant is a company. OVAM grants a beneficiary a maximum of EUR 200,000 co-financing over a period of three years.

Through its decision of 15 March 2013, the Flemish Government has included the legal conditions for the subsidy in the Flemish Regulations for Soil Remediation and Soil Protection (VLAREBO). Those who meet these conditions can submit an application for co-financing using the form provided for this purpose.

title: Guideline on Federal Funding for Energy and Resource Efficiency in the economy - funding competition
description:
The aim of this guideline is to increase energy and resource efficiency with a view to the goal of greenhouse gas neutrality in 2045 through investments by industry, to expand the share of renewable energy in the provision of process heat and to support German industry in implementing its decarbonization strategy. The funding is intended to trigger investments in particular in plant and process modernization at the highest possible level of energy efficiency, to promote the efficient use of resources and to accelerate the market penetration of highly efficient technologies so that there is a reduction in energy and resource requirements and the resulting CO2 emissions.
The special concerns of SMEs will be taken into account.
The directive is expected to trigger around 62,000 measures from 2022 to the end of 2026.
These measures are expected to achieve annual savings of 7.5 million metric tons of CO2 and 19 terawatt hours of final energy consumption. The funding program thus makes a concrete contribution both to achieving the climate and energy targets and to the planned reduction in primary energy consumption and implementation of Article 7 of the Energy Efficiency Directive.

title: Federal funding for efficient buildings - climate-friendly new construction (KFN)
description:
Der Bund gewährt Förderungen zur Verringerung der Umweltwirkungen und zur Erhöhung des Nachhaltigkeitsstandards bei der Schaffung neuen Wohnraums und bei der Errichtung neuer Wohn- und Nichtwohngebäude. Ziel der
Förderung ist die Reduzierung der Treibhausgasemissionen im Lebenszyklus, die Verringerung des Primärenergiebedarfs in der Betriebsphase und die Erhöhung des Einsatzes erneuerbarer Energien unter Einhaltung von Prinzipien
des nachhaltigen Bauens auf Grundlage dieser Richtlinie und nach Maßgabe insbesondere der §§ 23 und 44 der
Bundeshaushaltsordnung (BHO) sowie den dazu erlassenen Verwaltungsvorschriften.
Die Bundesförderung für effiziente Gebäude – Klimafreundlicher Neubau (KFN) trägt dazu bei, die Treibhausgasemissionen im Gebäudesektor bis 2030 auf 67 Millionen Tonnen CO2-Äquivalente zu mindern und somit sowohl die
nationalen als auch die europäischen Energie- und Klimaziele bis 2030 zu erreichen. Die jährlichen CO2-ÄquivalenteMinderungsziele für die einzelnen Sektoren ergeben sich aus den zulässigen Jahresemissionsmengen des BundesKlimaschutzgesetzes.

Amélioration de l’impact environnemental des réseaux télécom

Taux d'aides: Variable selon la taille de l’entreprise et le type de projet 
RI : PE 70% (*80%) | ME 60% (*75%) | GE/ETI 50% (*65% )
DE : PE 45% (*60%) | ME 35% (*50%) | GE/ETI 25% (*40% )

title: SIMEST. Fondo 394/81. Finanziamento a tasso zero e contributo a fondo perduto a sostegno delle imprese esportatrici con approvvigionamenti da Ucraina e/o Federazione Russa e/o Bielorussia.
description:
Si tratta di un finanziamento destinato alle imprese esportatrici verso qualunque geografia con approvvigionamenti da Ucraina e/o Federazione Russa e/o Bielorussia e che subiscano un calo degli stessi o un aumento complessivo del costo totale di tali forniture. Sarà da dimostrare la riduzione del fatturato per poter richiedere questo aiuto (maggiori dettagli nella circolare).

Il grant massimo è del 40% per una spesa massima di 1.500.000 (in funzione del temporary framework però il limite è sempre 400.000)

scope: Stimulate proactive and innovative developments that make Limburg's agriculture and horticulture more resilient to drought.
title: Droogte Innovatie Fonds
description: Water is an essential production factor in agriculture and horticulture, among other things. However, the drought of recent years has had a huge impact on the availability of water. Both the sector and individual companies have already taken initiatives, invested and started projects to achieve the transition to a climate-robust Limburg agricultural sector. In order to strengthen and accelerate this movement, the Province of Limburg is creating a supporting subsidy regulation with the Drought Innovation Fund. It is intended to stimulate proactive and innovative developments that make Limburg's agriculture and horticulture more resilient to drought.

scope: Promotion of emission-free and low-emission drives and the sustainable modernisation of inland vessels
title: Förderung emissionsfreier und emissionsarmer Antriebe sowie der nachhaltigen Modernisierung von Binnenschiffen
description: In order to achieve the European and German clean air and climate protection targets, inland shipping must also become climate-neutral. The promotion of inland shipping as a comparatively sustainable mode of transport in terms of transport volumes comparatively sustainable mode of transport is a priority of both European and German transport and climate policy. Progress towards climate-neutral inland shipping can only be achieved with emission-free and low-emission engines and drives

title: Sostegno alle PMI lombarde per lo sviluppo di azioni di economia circolare nelle filiere della plastica e del tessile

scope: "Promotion of research and development projects and measures for the transfer of technology and knowledge in the organic agriculture and food sector"

description: In addition to basic and development-oriented research projects, the guideline is intended to promote practice-oriented projects in particular - also with a model character - and the fastest possible transfer of technology and knowledge from research results to farms, processing companies and trading companies through to consumers. Funding can also be provided for status quo analyses and meta-studies to achieve the objectives.

scope: e innovation competition "GreenEconomy.IN.NRW" therefore supports small and medium-sized enterprises in sustainably exploiting the ecological innovation potential of North Rhine-Westphalia as a business location.
title: Innovationswettbewerb GreenEconomy.IN.NRW
description: The aim is to strengthen NRW as a centre of innovation and business as a pioneer of ecological transformation in line with the European Green Deal and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Small and medium-sized enterprises are to be supported in exploiting innovation potential for climate and environmental protection, resource conservation, circular value creation and adaptation to climate change.

scope: "Funding of projects on the topic ""Application-oriented quantum informatics"""
title: Förderung von Projekten zum Thema "Anwendungsorientierte Quanteninformatik"
description: The "Application-oriented quantum computing" funding programme aims to provide evidence of practical user benefits through the use of a quantum computer or at least to develop the foundations for this and estimate the resources required. New players are to be attracted to the application of quantum computing and established institutions are to continue and expand their activities. Within this framework, users from industry and basic research are to be enabled to assess the potential of quantum computing for use in the respective subject area under consideration.

scope: Promotion of projects in research and innovation cooperation with the countries of the Eastern Partnership and Central Asia
title: Förderung von Projekten in der Forschungs- und Innovationszusammenarbeit mit den Ländern der Östlichen Partnerschaft und Zentralasiens
description: Research cooperation with the Eastern Partnership countries (Armenia, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Moldova and Ukraine) and Central Asia (Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Mongolia, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan) has already increased significantly in recent years. In the context of the "turning point" due to the open Russian war of aggression against Ukraine, the importance of these regions for cooperation has continued to increase. Research and innovation cooperation supports the civil society, economic and ecological development of these countries. It helps to strengthen common values and promote reform processes.

scope: Sostenere gli investimenti delle PMI, realizzati e localizzati in Calabria, per favorire modelli di produzione che facciano perno sulla transizione ecologica (risparmio energetico, uso efficiente delle risorse, packaging intelligente) e digitale (tecnologie aggiornate, ottimizzazione dei processi). title: Förderung von Projekten innerhalb der Driving Urban Transitions Partnership im Rahmen des aktuell gültigen Energieforschungsprogramms, der Strategie "Forschung für Nachhaltigkeit“, der Forschungsagenda "Nachhaltige urbane Mobilität“ und der Zukunftsstrategie "Forschung und Innovation“
description: This framework funding announcement refers to the Joint Calls of the DUT (hereinafter referred to as DUT Calls), which are published at regular intervals. The Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) and the Federal Ministry of Economics and Climate Protection (BMWK) participate in these calls. This interdepartmental (BMBF and BMWK) framework funding announcement complements the national and European funding measures for the transformation of cities (for example BMBF Future City Research) and provides the contribution of German energy research to the implementation of the goals of the DUT.

description: The aim of the funding measure is to create a high-performance start-up and innovation ecosystem and to reduce one-sided dependencies in the field of modern and future communication technologies. The funding measure strengthens the transfer of scientific findings into application in a structured and flexible manner through technical innovations, targeted expert advice and scientific and technical support.

title: Data Challenge en Santé

scope: Contribuir para reduzir a subcapitalização das empresas da Região Autónoma dos Açores e responder à dificuldade na angariação de financiamento junto dos Intermediários Financeiros, problemas agravados pela recente crise pandémica e/ou pela atual conjuntura macroeconómica, potenciando-se o investimento privado e o dinamismo empresarial; ▪ Colmatar a falha de mercado no que diz respeito ao acesso a instrumentos financeiros e de capital por parte de empresas com sede e atividade na Região Autónoma dos Açores.
title: Capital Participativo Açores I (Aviso n.º 03/C05-i04-RAA/2023)
Promotion of energy efficiency and CO2 savings in agriculture and horticulture Part A - Primary agricultural production
description: The funding measures of this guideline are part of the federal programme. By making use of the support, agricultural enterprises are to produce significantly fewer CO2 equivalents (hereinafter referred to as CO2) in their energy use. The annual emissions are to be reduced by 1.1 million tonnes of CO2 by 2030.

title: "Promotion of measures for the transfer of new findings from research and development projects into agricultural practice in the context of model and demonstration projects Animal welfare for small and medium-sized enterprises"
description: In order to provide livestock farms with new scientific findings and innovations with new methods, forms or procedures of technology and knowledge transfer as well as information measures, and to show them possibilities of practical implementation, also taking into account economic aspects on their own farms, the Federal Ministry of Food and Agriculture (BMEL) intends to support selected, exemplary and innovative knowledge transfer projects2 within the framework of model and demonstration projects. These can cover the areas of animal welfare, animal husbandry, animal and environment - in particular avoidance of non-curative interventions, reduction of antibiotic use and further development of husbandry methods.

title: Funding of transnational research projects under the first call of the coordination and support action "Green ERA Hub"
description: The aim of this call is to support transnational collaborative projects that contribute to improving the sustainability and resilience of agricultural and food systems. Across themes, this includes not only consideration of resource use and how it is used, but also the reduction of emissions, particularly of greenhouse gases, and the effect of these changes on agricultural yields, product quality, human nutrition and economic viability.

title: Corporate Mobility Management Focus "Promotion of innovation"
description: With this call for funding, innovative and comprehensive implementation projects of Corporate Mobility Management in the sense of the definition of the guideline are funded on the basis of already existing mobility concepts or in-depth, conceptual considerations.

title: Promotion of locally CO2 emission-free, alternative drives in local rail passenger and freight transport (07/2023)
description: With the funding guideline for the promotion of alternative drives in rail transport, the Federal Ministry of Digital Affairs and Transport (BMDV) supports the market ramp-up of rail vehicles with climate-friendly, alternative drives in rail transport. The focus of the funding is on the procurement of rail vehicles with locally emission-free, alternative drives and the charging and refuelling infrastructure required for their operation.

title: Research and development projects and measures for technology and knowledge transfer for sustainable production, processing and marketing of agricultural products
description: In addition to basic and development-oriented research projects, the guideline is also intended to promote practice-oriented projects - also of an exemplary nature - and the fastest possible transfer of technology and knowledge from research results to farms, processing companies and trading companies.

title: Funding of projects on the topic of "Innovative Materials and Processes for Quantum Systems
description: The aim of this call is, on the one hand, to (further) develop innovative materials and process technologies that enable concrete applications in photonics and quantum technologies. On the other hand, completely new materials and processes are to be researched for application in quantum technologies.

scope: Expression of interest process
title: Expression of interest procedure for the planned funding of lighthouse projects for the ramp-up of industrial production capacities in the field of photovoltaics
description: Subsidies for selected lighthouse projects for the production of solar modules required for the transition to a carbon-neutral economy and in particular the key components required for this, as well as the extraction, processing and recycling of the relevant raw materials required for this, processing and recycling of the relevant raw materials required for this purpose.

title: Funding of international collaborative projects within the framework of the National Bioeconomy Strategy "Contributions to sustainable and resilient agricultural and food systems"
description: En concreto, se financiarán proyectos de investigación e innovación que contribuyan a sistemas de producción sostenibles y eficientes en la agricultura y en la producción de alimentos y piensos. Esto se aplica en particular a los proyectos que persiguen enfoques eficientes y de conservación de recursos en la aplicación y recuperación de fertilizantes o sus componentes, o que investigan métodos de cultivo agrícola que conducen a la reducción del uso de fertilizantes.

title: Funding of "Translational Research on Cancer Epigenetics within the framework of the ERA-NET TRANSCAN-3
description: TRANSCAN-3 aims to support highly innovative and ambitious collaborative projects in translational cancer research at the European and international level and believes that it is timely and relevant to focus its funding on this topic for the preceding reasons.

title: ZIM cooperation projects within the framework of IraSME
description: IraSME is a network of ministries and funding agencies for joint support of transnational projects of companies in national/regional funding programs.

title: Funding guideline Innovation program for business models and pioneering solutions (IGP)
description: The "Innovation Program for Business Models and Pioneer Solutions (IGP)" of the Federal Ministry of Economics and Climate Protection (BMWK) is intended to strengthen the innovative power of the German economy beyond technical developments, thereby also taking into account a more holistic understanding of innovation.

title: Germany and Chile launch 1st call for joint R&D projects
description:
To facilitate collaboration with cooperation partners from abroad, the BMWK has reached agreements with several countries on joint innovation funding for SMEs and initiated cross-border calls for proposals. The procedures for reviewing and approving funding applications are coordinated among the participating countries. The funding is provided in each case from the national programs - for the German partners from the ZIM, which provides an increased funding rate of up to 10% for transnational collaborations.

Chile is a key country in Latin America and an important trading partner for Germany, which will continue to play an important role in achieving climate targets and transforming industry in the future, among other things in the area of cooperation on renewable energies and hydrogen.

scope: Financiar el desarrollo de planes y proyectos de contenido tecnológico, innovador y sostenible que, presentados por las pequeñas y medianas empresas de comercio al por menor, ya sea de manera individual o a través de sus asociaciones.
title: Modernización del Comercio: Fondo Tecnológico
description: RESOLUCIÓN 213E/2023, de 7 de junio, de la directora general de Turismo, Comercio y Consumo, por la que se aprueba la convocatoria de subvenciones del Programa del comercio Fondo Tecnológico de 2023, en el marco del Plan de Recuperación, Transformación y Resiliencia.

title: Promotion of Natural Climate Protection Measures in Companies (KfW Environmental Program)
description: This funding is intended to contribute to the implementation of the German government's "Action Program for Natural Climate Protection" (ANK) by supporting the conservation, renaturation and restoration of near-natural ecosystems as well as measures for the unsealing and renaturation of soils and a natural, decentralized precipitation management on commercially used areas of private companies. The aim is to achieve positive positive effects for climate protection and the preservation of biodiversity, combined with a strengthening of the resilience of ecosystems and companies to the impacts of climate change. of ecosystems and companies against the negative effects of the climate crisis. The aim is to create sinks sinks in which greenhouse gases are sequestered are to be created and stabilized in order to ensure the achievement of climate targets for the Land Use, Land Use Change and Forestry (LULUCF) sector; LULUCF).

title: "Funding guideline Climate adaptation in social institutions within the framework of the ""National Climate Adaptation"" programme"
description: The purpose of this funding guideline is to provide targeted incentives for the sustainable and climate-resilient adaptation of social institutions by funding exemplary model projects in social institutions that that inspire imitation through their charisma. This is intended to meet the overarching funding goal of promoting the necessary climate adaptation processes in the health, care and social sectors as systematically and in an integrated manner as possible on the basis of climate adaptation concepts and in accordance with the goals of the German Sustainability Strategy.

title: Creación y desarrollo de Pymes innovadoras
description: ANUNCIO de 27 de abril de 2020, relativo a la convocatoria de préstamos participativos para la creación y desarrollo de PYMEs innovadoras (FCF1_CD nº 01/19) del Fondo Canarias Financia 1.

scope: Supports the North Rhine-Westphalian economy and science in developing competitive innovations and finding solutions that help to further advance the continuation of the digital transformation and the competitive advantages of digitalisation.
title: Innovationswettbewerb NEXT.IN.NRW
description:
The location-specific strengths of the state of North Rhine-Westphalia are to be consolidated and expanded within the following three thematic areas:

Culture, Media and Creative Industries
Artificial intelligence
information and communication technologies; Cybersecurity in business
The Regional Innovation Strategy thus merges the two innovation fields "Culture, Media and Creative Industries and Innovative Services" (thematic priorities "Culture, Media and Creative Industries" and "Artificial Intelligence") and the cross-cutting field "Key Technologies of the Future, ICT" (thematic priorities "Artificial Intelligence" and "Information and Communication Technologies; Cybersecurity in Business").

scope: 1. Transição digital dos processos operacionais, incluindo a produção e a gestão e o planeamento logísticos. 2. Soluções para armazenamento, gestão e tratamento avançados de dados. 3. scope: UK registered businesses can apply for a share of up to £4.5 million across the two strands of the competition. In this strand we will support R&D feasibility studies that provide immersive digital mental health therapeutic solutions.
title: Mindset: Extended Reality for digital mental health – Strand 1
description:
Innovate UK, part of UK Research and Innovation, will invest up to £4.5 million in innovation projects across the two strands of the competition.

The aim of this competition is to develop digital therapeutic Extended Reality (XR) solutions to provide improved delivery of mental health and wellbeing services.

This competition is split into two strands:

Mindset: Extended reality for digital mental health – strand 1: Feasibility Studies (this strand)
Mindset: Extended reality for digital mental health – strand 2: Industrial Research
Your solution must plan to be applied and trialed following a feasibility study cycle of between 3 to 6 months. It must have the potential to be adopted at scale to form part of the UK’s formal mental healthcare ecosystem.

Your proposal must include the design and features of your solution and how it will be applied.

It is your responsibility to ensure you submit your application to the correct strand for your project. You will not be able to transfer your application and it will not be sent for assessment if it is out of scope.

In applying to this competition, you are entering into a competitive process.

This competition closes at 11am UK time on the deadline stated.

scope: Identifier et recenser des causes aggravantes et des démarches, méthodes, solutions ou dispositifs innovants au phénomène de Retrait Gonflement des sols Argileux
title: Prévention et Remédiation des désordres bâtimentaires dus au phénomène de Retrait Gonflement des sols Argileux
description:
Dans le cadre de France 2030, cet appel à projets s’inscrit dans la stratégie d’accélération « Ville Durable et Bâtiments innovants », issue d'une volonté politique du Gouvernement de refonder le développement urbain autour des quatre défis que sont ; la sobriété, la résilience, l’inclusion et la production urbaine.
Cette transformation structurelle prend appui sur le projet de loi Climat-Résilience qui entend renforcer le positionnement de la France sur la trajectoire de la lutte contre le changement climatique.
En France métropolitaine, 54 % des maisons individuelles sont construites dans des zones d’aléas moyen et fort.
Les désordres liés au phénomène de retrait gonflement des sols argileux correspondent à des dégâts structuraux importants qui compromettent la solidité du bâtiment et la sécurité de ses habitants.
Les travaux nécessaires à leur remédiation sont souvent coûteux, et la mise en œuvre souvent complexe ou lourde car ils correspondent principalement à une reprise en sous œuvre totale ou partielle.

scope: L’objectif de réduction des émissions de gaz à effet de serre de l’industrie défini par la Stratégie Nationale Bas Carbone est de -35 % entre 2015 et 2030, nécessitant a minima une baisse des émissions de l’industrie de 81 MtCO₂eq par an en 2015 à 53 MtCO₂eq par an à horizon 2030. En plus de favoriser les investissements dans des secteurs et filières moteurs de la transition écologique, le plan France 2030 consacre 5 milliards d'euros spécifiquement aux projets de décarbonation des sites industriels.

scope: Recovery of part of the costs of patent applications until they are granted
title: Win4Expertise : Demander une aide au dépôt de brevet
description:
Patent filing assistance covers part of the costs incurred by patent applications (fees and fees) until the grant of the latter (including the costs of national validations of the European patent). The aid has 3 intervention components (see procedure point):

1st PATDE component: submission of the priority application;
2nd PATEX component: formalities subsequent to the first filing, after analysis of the search report, and procedures with a view to territorially extending protection with invocation of the right of priority and obtaining the grant in the designated countries.
3rd PATOP component: formalities arising from an opposition at European level by a third party, vis-à-vis a patent that has been the subject of PATEX aid.

scope: The “OP IN” (Operating Innovation) aid mechanism provides support for organisational and/or process innovations that companies plan to implement.
title: OP-IN (Innovation de procédé ou d'organisation) (Subvention)
description:
Process innovation consists of implementing production or distribution operations, with the aim of increasing the added value produced by the company in question, within the corresponding sector, that are new or significantly improved compared to the existing state of the art, in particular due to the originality of the arrangement of these operations or the characteristics of some of them.

Organisational innovation consists of implementing human-resources management for the workplace and internal and external individuals in companies, which must be considered, within the corresponding sector, as new or significantly improved compared to the existing state of the art. Organisational innovation must involve the use of information and communication technology and may concern various aspects of human-resources management, such as the assignment of workers, their management, their mobility, their internal and external relationships, their internal and external communication or even their training. This innovation must aim to increase the added value produced by the company.

scope: Fund ambitious research that is strongly positioned upstream, in promising themes for the Walloon Region
title: WIN4EXCELLENCE
description:
The Win4Excellence measure is part of the PROJECT axis (Obtaining funds to carry out a research project alone, or in partnership) of the reform of research aid according to identified needs (Win4Research).

This excellence programme for universities, in collaboration with approved research centres, aims to finance ambitious research that is strongly positioned upstream, in promising themes for the Walloon Region, for example in the Strategic Innovation Areas of RIS3, or in the areas specifically highlighted in the Regional Policy Declaration, such as space or cybersecurity.

scope: Programme ayant pour but de soutenir des projets de restauration de la nature, de développement de la biodiversité et  d'amélioration de la gestion de l'environnement.
title: LIFE (Programme pour l'environnement et l'action pour le climat)

scope: This aid allows SMEs to use an external public organisation – approved collective research centre, public research organisation, university or college research department – to perform technical tasks (analyses, measurements, tests, etc.) as part of a support, consultancy and back-up process for innovation
title: Win4Expertise - Support Technique
description:
The Win4Expertise – Technical support  measure is part of the Win4Expertise axis (Assistance for companies using external expertise) of the research aid reform based on identified needs (Win4Research).

This aid allows SMEs to use an external public organisation – approved collective research centre, public research organisation, university or college research department – to perform technical tasks (analyses, measurements, tests, etc.) as part of a support, consultancy and back-up process for innovation, ideally prior to R&D activities within the company. These studies last from 6–24 months.

scope: Elia customers in Flanders can apply for a grant to help them implement energy-saving measures.

scope: Business terrains and buildings are crucial for sustainable economic growth. Even so, such accommodation is not always easy to find. With the subsidy for the (re)development, (re)design or management of business terrains, we aim to do something about this.
title: Bedrijventerreinen
description: Business activity is essential: companies generate added value, income and prosperity. However, such business activity requires space: workshops, storage units, offices, research infrastructure, starter centres, incubator buildings, building plots, etc. Business terrains and buildings are crucial for sustainable economic growth. Even so, such accommodation is not always easy to find. With the subsidy for the (re)development, (re)design or management of business terrains, we aim to do something about this.

scope: Feasibility study in preparation of innovative projects
title: O&O haalbaarheidsstudie
description:
Companies and organisations may carry out a feasibility study as a way to prepare themselves for an important, ambitious, financially supportable, innovative follow-up trajectory (research project, development project, ICON project). 

Having carried out a feasibility study does, however, not mean that a company and/ or organisation(s) will automatically receive follow-up support from VLAIO. 

The intended innovation during the follow-up trajectory should have sufficient valorisation potential for Flanders. This valorisation potential should at least qualitatively have been worked out before the start of a feasibility study, but can, however, still contain uncertainties.  

The study must - in large part - experimentally research the challenging technical and/ or scientific aspects of the project. Additionally, topics such as business model innovation, service innovation and possible Intellectual Property Rights problems could be investigated.

Applicants should be able to prove that the aim of their feasibility study is to eventually conduct further innovative research and to develop innovative products/ services/ knowledge. In addition, the feasibility study should allow companies and organisations to make a better estimate of the risks and opportunities involved before the investment has been made and a follow-up trajectory has been started up. 

Studies that only serve as a way to generate new ideas, or that only strive for a market study or a short-term solution do not come into consideration for this subsidy. 

In principle, the duration of a feasibility study is between 3 and 12 months.

title: ENERGIESTEUN
description: Companies with an operating loss in the period from 1 October to 31 December 2022 are eligible for aid. It must be more than a doubling of electricity and gas costs in the fourth quarter 2022 compared to 2021. Only the part (additional cost) above the doubling of energy costs is eligible for aid.

scope: Funding guideline Electromobility
title: Förderrichtlinie Elektromobilität
description:
"Electric mobility is part of the Federal Government's package of measures to achieve the goals of the Paris Climate Agreement and the Climate Protection Plan 2050. It is a central component in the Climate Protection Programme 2030.
By 2030, 15 million electric passenger cars are to be registered in Germany. Building on these objectives and targets, the Federal Ministry of Digital Affairs and Transport is supporting the development of electric vehicles. (BMDV) is using this funding guideline to support the further market ramp-up of electromobility on a broad scale and to create a broad range of funding opportunities for all stakeholders.
On the one hand, funding is provided for the establishment of electric vehicle fleets in the municipal, regional and commercial environment. commercial environment. The aim of the funding is to make a significant contribution to the electrification of vehicle fleets and to to provide the relevant actors with appropriate support for the conversion of their vehicle fleets"

title: Danube4all
description: DANUBE4all aims to enhance the free-flowing status of rivers and floodplains, reduce flood and drought risks, and improve sediment and biota continuity. In addition to research activities at the three Demonstration Sites in the Danube River Basin, the project will also provide GIS and Citizen Science tools for upscaling restoration actions via ten Synergy Sites and transfer outcomes to five Associated Regions by developing Replication Roadmaps for restoration action.

title: Important Projects of Common European Interest (IPCEI) - Batterien - Thema: Industrielle Produktion für mobile und stationäre Energiespeicher.
description: Leistungsstarke Batterien sind die Schlüsseltechnologie, um die Erreichung der Klimaziele im Verkehrssektor zu ermöglichen und gleichzeitig Wettbewerbsfähigkeit und Beschäftigung im Mobilitäts- und Energiebereich zu sichern. Das europäische Batterieökosystem hat sich in den vergangenen Jahren sehr dynamisch und positiv entwickelt. Industrielle Innovationsvorhaben – „Important Projects of Common European Interest“ (IPCEI), beihilferechtlich genehmigt durch die EU-Kommission – bilden dabei tragende Säulen. Unter dem europäischen Dach zweier IPCEI zu Batterien versammeln sich aktuell 12 Mitgliedsstaaten und mehr als 50 Unternehmen entlang des gesamten Batterie-Wertschöpfungsprozesses vom Material über die Zellen zum Batteriesystem und dem Recycling.

title: Création, extension ou modernisation d’un centre de tri de déchets et valorisation de la matière/EnR - ADEME
description:
Accélérer la modernisation du parc des centres de tri face à l’augmentation des volumes et à la production de nouveaux emballages
Accroître la remise sur le marché de matières secondaires par la promotion du tri en privilégiant le non mélange à la source

Projets d’investissement portant sur les bâtiments et le process, bénéficiant d’une étude territoriale préalable
   - VRD (Voirie, réseaux, divers)
   - Équipements mobiles assurant un fonctionnement optimisé
   - Équipements fixes (dispositifs de pesée ou de contrôle d’accès)
   - Logiciels de gestion du centre de tri

Taux d'aides:
   - Tri des emballages ménagers :10% des dépenses éligibles (plafonné à 1,1M€)
   -  Autres : 35 % à 55% (plafonné à 1,5M€)

Soutenir l’investissement de ces DM dans les établissements de santé 

Taux d'aide : PE : 45% | ME: 35% | GE 10%

title: Prévention et remédiation des désordres causés aux bâtiments dus au phénomène de retrait gonflement des sols argileux (RGA) - ADEME

Identifier et recenser des causes aggravantes et des démarches, méthodes, solutions ou dispositifs innovants au phénomène de Retrait Gonflement des sols Argileux

Projets individuels ou collaboratifs d’innovation visant à solutionner les désordres causés aux bâtiments liés au phénomènes de gonflements des sols argileux  sur l’un des axes suivants :

   - Axe 2 : Prévention

Taux d'aides:
Variable selon le type de projets et la taille de l’entreprise

   - DE : PE 45% (60%*)|ME 35% (50%*) |GE/ ETI 25% (40%*)
   - Etude de Faisabilité : PE 70%|ME 60% |GE/ ETI  50%

scope: L'appel à projets soutient des projets d’investissement pour développer les capacités industrielles dans le domaine des EnR et d’accompagner l’industrialisation de la production et/ou l’assemblage des composants et des technologies innovantes de réseaux.
title: Aide à l'investissement de l'offre industrielle des énergies renouvelables - ADEME
description:
Développer les chaînes de valeurs et technologies dédiées aux EnR pour réduire la dépendance aux industries fossiles et contribuer à une mise en œuvre souveraine de la transition énergétique
Développer la compétitivité des industries d’EnR en finançant des technologies de rupture ou des projets de fabrication de produits moins innovants mais contribuant à la réduction de la dépendance à la concurrence étrangère

Projets individuels ou collaboratifs  (dont PME ou ETI | maximum 5 partenaires)

Taux d'aides: 
Investissements industriels (zone AFR) PE 30 à 70% | ME 20 à 40% | GE 10 à 30%
Hors zone AFR PE 35% | ME 25% | GE 15%
RDI (DE) PE 45% | ME 35% | GE 25%
Efficacité énergétique et environnementale PE 50% | ME 40% | GE 30%

title: Recyclage des plastiques, composites et élastomères - ADEME
description:
Accompagner les investissements nécessaires à l’industrialisation de nouvelles capacités sur la chaine de recyclage des plastiques, composites et élastomères, du tri à l’incorporation de matière recyclée. Favoriser le développement des technologies industrielles du recyclage de ces matières en France et la fabrication de MPR venant notamment soutenir une trajectoire ambitieuse de découplage entre croissance économique et consommation de ressources naturelles.

Individuel ou collaboratif

Taux d'aide variable selon le type de dépense, la taille de l’entreprise et sa situation géographique
Dépenses d’investissements hors zone AFR : PE 55% | ME 45% |GE 35% (+5% à +15% si l’entreprise est en zone AFR a) ou c)
Dépenses RI : PE 70% (80%*) | ME 60% (75%*) | GE 50% (65%*)
Dépenses DE : PE 45% (60%*) | ME 35% (50%*) | GE 25% (40%*)

title: i-Démo - Soutien aux projets structurants de R&D - BPI
description:
Ce dispositif soutient le développement de produits ou services très innovants et à haute valeur ajoutée, afin de renforcer la base scientifique et technologique française. Il soutient aussi des démonstrateurs à l’échelle industrielle ou préindustrielle d’innovations à un stade de développement avancé (prototype en environnement représentatif, lignes pilotes)

Individuel ou Collaboratif

Variable selon la taille de la société, la nature du projet (individuel/collaboratif) et le type de recherche:
     - RI : PE 70% (80%*) | ME 60% (75%*) | ETI/GE 50% (65%*)
     - DE PE 45% (60%*) | ME 35% (50%*) | ETI/GE 25% (40%*)

scope: Cet appel à projets s'adresse aux entreprises et organismes de recherche en mesure de faire émerger une offre française innovante sur les marchés nationaux et mondiaux.
title: Produits biosourcés et biotechnologies industrielles - ADEME
description:
Poursuivre le soutien à la recherche et à l’innovation sur les biotechnologies industrielles et les produits biosourcés ; Sécuriser l’approvisionnement en biomasse ; Favoriser l’investissement productif et le développement de l’offre française.

Individuel ou collaboratif, abordant les thématiques prioritaires suivantes: 
     - Thématique 1 : Elargissement des gisements de biomasse
     - Thématique 2 : Procédés liés à la transformation de la biomasse
     - Thématique 3: Accompagnement de l’industrialisation 

Pour la thématique 1 et 2 : Variable selon le type de recherche, la taille de la société et le type de montage (individuel ou collaboratif ):
     - Recherche industrielle :PE 70% (collab: 80%) | ME 60% (75%) | GE/ETI 50 (65%) 
     - Développement expérimental :PE 45% (60%) | ME 35% (50%) | GE/ETI 25% (40%)
     - Protection de l’environnement PE 60% | ME 50% | GE/ETI 40%
Thématique 3 : variable selon le régime d’aide appliqué 
     - Régime de la RDI Hors zone AFR : PE 60% | ME 50% | GE 40% 
     - Soutien à l’investissement en vue d’une reprise durable :PE 35% | ME 25% | GE 15% plafonné à 10M€ de dépenses éligibles

scope: Le dispositif RAPID (Régime d’APpui à l’Innovation Duale) est un dispositif de subvention de projets d’innovation duale portés par une entreprise d’effectif consolidé de moins de 2000 salariés, seule ou en consortium.  RAPID (Régime d'Appui pour l'Innovation Duale) est un dispositif de subvention de projets d’innovation duale mis en place par l’Agence de l’Innovation de Défense (AID).
title: Régime d'appui aux PME pour l'innovation duale (RAPID) - DGA

Cette stratégie nationale contribue à l’un des objectifs du Plan France 2030 : investir dans une alimentation saine, durable et traçable

Projets individuels d’investissement dans  la biomasse dont la production thermique > 6 000 MWh/an visant à alimenter en chaleur des industries du bois manufacturières au sens de  l’INSEE

Un bonus pour les projets situés en zone AFR peut être accordé

title: Soutien aux projets d’investissements pour produire en France les véhicules routiers de demain et leurs composants - BPI
description:
Soutenir les efforts d’investissement productif de la filière automobile entre 2023 et 2026 afin de :
- Produire au moins 2 millions de véhicules électriques par an en France 
- Maitriser la conception et l’industrialisation des composants du véhicule de demain 
- Accélérer la modernisation et la diversification des sous traitants 

Projets s’inscrivant dans l’un des 5 volets suivants : Volet 1 : Développement et assemblage des véhicules de demain | Volet 2 : Production des principaux composants et équipements du véhicule de demain | Volet 3 : Production des infrastructures de recharge et d’avitaillement pour les véhicules électriques à batterie et à hydrogène | Volet 4 : Diversification des sous-traitants automobile | Volet 5 : Projets d’amélioration de la performance environnementale des procédés et sites de production

Taux d'aides:
Variable selon le type d’investissement, la taille et la situation géographique de l’entreprise et le type de projet selon les régime n°SA.103603 AFR pour la période 2022-2027 | Régime cadre n°SA.100189 relatif aux PME | Régime n°SA.58995 RDI et régime RDI n°SA.102230 dans le cadre de la relance | Régime n°SA.59108 lié à la protection de l’environnement | Régime n°SA.102077 liée à une reprise durable

scope: Si vous avez un projet de Recherche, de Développement, d’Innovation (RDI) mais que la thématique ne correspond à aucun appel à projets actuellement ouvert sur la plateforme de l’ADEME, cette aide vous concerne.
title: Projets de Recherche, Développement ou Innovation (RDI) - ADEME
description:
Soutenir le développement de connaissances ou de solutions/technologies en vue d’accompagner les transitions énergétique, sociétale et environnementale 
Développer des approches/méthodologies pour concevoir des nouvelles solutions ou technologies avec une optimisation des usages et une minimisation des impacts environnementaux, sociaux et sanitaires

Projets individuels ou collaboratifs devant être intégrés dans la stratégie RD 2021-2027 de l’ADEME, et ne répondant pas aux aides ciblées en cours. Un TRL de 4 à 7 est attendu pour les projets technologiques. Projets ciblant prioritairement les domaines suivants :
Changement climatique
Bioéconomie et de l’économie circulaire
Préservation des sols, 
Efficacité énergétique et énergies renouvelables
Qualité de l’air

Taux d'aides:
Recherche fondamentale : PE 70% | ME 60% | GE 50%
Recherche industrielle : PE 70% | ME 60% | GE 50% 
Développement expérimental : PE 45% | ME 35% | GE 25%
Etude de faisabilité préalable à la R&D : PE 70% | ME 60% | GE 50%
Innovation procédé : PE | ME 50% | GE (avec collaboration PME) 15%

scope: Promover la implantación de sistemas térmicos renovables en diferentes sectores de la economía para contribuir al cumplimiento de los objetivos del Plan de Recuperación, Transformación y Resiliencia, contribuyendo con ello a la descarbonización de los distintos sectores de la economía, así como a la consecución de los objetivos fijados tanto por el Plan Nacional Integrado de Energía y Clima 2021-2030; contribuyendo al mismo tiempo con los objetivos de reducción de emisiones y contaminantes atmosféricos establecidos en la Directiva 2016/2284 del Parlamento Europeo y del Consejo, de 14 de diciembre de 2016, la Directiva 2008/50/CE del Parlamento Europeo y del Consejo, de 21 de mayo de 2008, y el Programa Nacional de Control de la Contaminación Atmosférica (PNCCA) 2020-2030.

title: Contributo a fondo perduto per rilanciare il turismo di montagna. Ministero del turismo.
description:
Il presente avviso è finalizzato a selezionare progetti (“Progetti per la Montagna”) presentati da soggetti privati profit e non profit, con preferenza premiale per quelli organizzati in rete o raggruppati, per la valorizzazione turistica del patrimonio montano e per il potenziamento delle infrastrutture esistenti, per la fruizione sostenibile, anche alla luce dei cambiamenti climatici in atto, specie nelle Regioni del Meridione d’Italia.
Spesa massima per progetto di 2.000.000 euro con un fondo perduto del 100%

title: MISE. PNRR M2C2I5.3. Finanziamento a tasso agevolato e finanziamento a fondo perduto per lo sviluppo di una leadership internazionale, industriale e di ricerca e sviluppo nel campo degli autobus elettrici
description: Lo strumento sostiene la realizzazione di programmi di investimento funzionali alla trasformazione verde e digitale dell’industria degli autobus attraverso la produzione di veicoli elettrici e connessi, ad esclusione di quelli a trazione ibrida. (Contratti di sviluppo- filiera degli autobus elettrici)

scope: The Programme is fine-tuned to fill the gap between the research of digital technologies and their deployment, and to bring the results of research to the market - for the benefit of Europe's citizens and businesses, and in particular SMEs. Investments under the Digital Europe programme supports the Union’s twin objectives of a green transition and digital transformation and strengthens the Union’s resilience and strategic autonomy.
title: Programa Europa Digital (DIGITAL) 2022
description: Programa Europa Digital (DIGITAL) 2022

scope: Odin is a pilot study focused on improving hospital safety, productivity and quality. This project seeks to enable Smart Hospitals, leveraging AI-based technology to transform the future of healthcare delivery.
title: ODIN Open call 2022
description: ODIN Open call

title: PSR Campania 2014-2022. Intervento 4.4.2 “Creazione e/o ripristino e/o ampliamento di infrastrutture verdi e di elementi del paesaggio agrario” (intervento B e intervento C).
description:
Il bando ha come obiettivo il miglioramento delle condizioni ambientali del territorio in un'ottica agro-climatica-ambientale, perseguendo il raggiungimento di uno stato di conservazione soddisfacente della biodiversità.
grant pari al 100%

title: PSR Campania 2014/2020. Intervento 4.1.5. Finanziamento a fondo perduto fino al 50% per investimenti finalizzati all'abbattimento del contenuto di azoto e alla valorizzazione agronomica dei reflui zootecnici delle aziende bufaline.
description: La tipologia di intervento finanzia investimenti nelle aziende zootecniche della filiera bufalina campana specificamente indirizzati a migliorare la gestione dei reflui e la loro utilizzazione agronomica attraverso l’introduzione di innovazioni tecnologiche e di processo in grado di ridurre gli apporti inquinanti alle risorse idriche e le emissioni in atmosfera. Il contributo a fondo perduto è del 50% a fronte di una massimo di spesa di 4.000.000

title: Psr Campania 2014/2020. I ntervento 4.1.1 Azione B. Finanziamento a fondo perduto per investimenti nelle aziende zootecniche bufaline.

Psr Campania 2014/2020. intervento 4.1.1 azione A. Finanziamento a fondo perduto per il miglioramento/realizzazione delle strutture produttive aziendali finalizzate all'ammodernamento/completamento della dotazione tecnologica e al risparmio energetico.
description: La tipologia di intervento 4.1.1 Azione A mira a favorire l’affermazione di una agricoltura forte, giovane e competitiva con filiere meglio organizzate, caratterizzate da aziende agricole dinamiche nel rispetto dei principi di sostenibilità ambientale. L'importo massimo del progetto è di 1.500.000 euro e il contributo a fondo perduto è di 50%.

title: L. 181/1989. MISE. Finanziamento a fondo perduto per la selezione di iniziative imprenditoriali nel territorio dell'area di crisi industriale complessa del Sistema locale del lavoro di Torino
description: L’obiettivo dell’Avviso in esame è quello di promuovere l’attrazione di nuovi investimenti e il rafforzamento del tessuto produttivo del territorio di Torino, con specifico riguardo alle filiere produttive del settore automotive e aerospazio. Si intende sviluppare le attività di R&S mediante nuovi Hub tecnologici, favorendo così sia la formazione specializzata che la riqualificazione delle competenze di quei lavoratori appartenenenti ai settori automotive e spazio.

title: PSR 2014-2022. Operazione. 5.1.1. Finanziamento a fondo perduto fino al 100% per la prevenzione dei danni da calamità naturali di tipo biotico.
description:
Il bando si propone di sostenere e promuovere investimenti in azioni di prevenzione volte a ridurre le conseguenze di probabili calamità naturali, avversità atmosferiche ed eventi catastrofici. Gli interventi possono essere realizzati su tutto il territorio del Piemonte, con priorità nelle aree a rischio di gravi danni al potenziale produttivo causati dalla presenza di Popillia japonica N. e Anoplophora spp.
Non c'è limite massimo di spesa e il grant può essere dell'80% o del 100% nel caso di spese sostenute da enti pubblici o da più di un beneficiario.

scope: L’appel à projets « Innovations en biothérapies et bioproduction » est un dispositif d’aide s’inscrivant dans le cadre de la stratégie d’accélération « Biothérapies et bioproduction de thérapies innovantes ». Il a pour objectif de catalyser et maintenir l’excellence de la recherche en biothérapie en accélérant notamment le transfert technologique et en assurant un flux constant d’innovations, de la paillasse au lit du patient.
title: Innovations en biothérapies et bioproduction - BPI
description:
Catalyser et maintenir l’excellence de la recherche en biothérapie en accélérant notamment le transfert technologique et en assurant un flux constant d’innovations, de la paillasse au lit du patient.

Projets individuels ou collaboratifs répondant à l’une des 2 thématiques :
Thématique 1 : Développement de biothérapies en santé humaine ou santé animale (lorsqu’un impact sur la santé humaine est envisagé) ;
Thématique 2 : Développement d’outils de R&D ou de stratification pour le développement de biothérapies

Taux d'aides: 
Recherche industrielle : 
PE 70%, ME 60%, GE et ETI 50% |  Projets collaboratifs : PE 80%, ME 70%, GE et ETI 60%
Développement expérimental :
PE 45%, ME 35%, GE et ETI 25% |  Projets collaboratifs : PE 60%, ME 50%, GE et ETI 40%

scope: L’appel à projets « Métaux critiques » est un dispositif d’aide s’inscrivant dans le cadre du plan d’investissement France 2030. Il a pour objectif de réduire la dépendance aux métaux critiques de l’industrie pour les politiques prioritaires de la France dans les champs industriels, environnementaux et climatiques.
title: Métaux critiques - BPI
description:
Réduire la dépendance aux métaux critiques de l’industrie pour les politiques prioritaires de la France dans les champs industriels, environnementaux et climatiques.
Accompagner des initiatives ambitieuses et rapidement industrialisables sur le territoire français portées par des acteurs émergents aptes à devenir des compétiteurs de niveau mondial ou par des acteurs d’excellence en place.

Taux d'aides: 
Investissements industriels : PE 30% | ME 20% | GE 10% 
RDI projet individuel : PE 45% | ME 35% | GE 25%
RDI projet collaboratif : PE 60% | ME 50% | GE 40%
Efficacité énergétique et environnementale : PE 60% | ME 50% | GE 40%

title: GAL Valli Marecchia e Conca. Operazione 6.4.01. Finanziamento a fondo perduto per la creazione e sviluppo di agriturismi e fattorie didattiche. Terza edizione
description:
L’azione ordinaria Operazione 6.4.01 “Creazione e sviluppo di agriturismi e fattorie didattiche” risponde al fabbisogno ” Favorire la diversificazione delle attività agricole e agroindustriali”, identificato nel PSR e alla focus area P2A “ammodernamento delle aziende agricole e forestali e diversificazione” mediante il sostegno:
• alla ristrutturazione e all’ampliamento di fabbricati rurali
• alla qualificazione di spazi aperti di aziende agricole esistenti
• all’acquisto di attrezzature da destinare all’attività agrituristica e/o di fattoria didattica
grant del 40 e 50 % rispettivamente per le zone B e D definite nel bando in corrispondenza dell'allegato A

title: PSR 2014-2022, misura 5.2. Finanziamento a fondo perduto fino al 100% per il ripristino dei terreni agricoli e del potenziale produttivo danneggiati da calamità naturali, avversità atmosferiche ed eventi catastrofici. Bando 2022
description: Il bando è finalizzato alla concessione di contributi in conto capitale a copertura dei costi sostenuti per il ripristino dei terreni agricoli e del potenziale produttivo agricolo e zootecnico distrutti o danneggiati da calamità naturali, avversità atmosferiche ed eventi catastrofici (comprese fitopatie ed infestazioni parassitarie) al fine di favorire la ripresa e la stabilità reddituale e occupazionale del settore agricolo.

scope: L’investimento persegue l’obiettivo climatico-ambientale di contribuire all’adattamento ai cambiamenti climatici e alla loro mitigazione tramite la promozione dell’energia sostenibile e dell’efficienza energetica tramite l’erogazione  di  un  contributo  a  fondo  perduto  per  la  realizzazione  di  impianti  fotovoltaici  su  edifici  a  uso produttivo nei settori agricolo, zootecnico e agroindustriale
title: MASAF. PNRR M2C1I2.2. Parco Agrisolare. Finanziamento a fondo perduto per l’installazione di pannelli fotovoltaici sulle coperture degli edifici ad uso produttivo nei settori agricolo, zootecnico e agroindustriale.

scope: Cet appel à projet vise à soutenir les innovations matérielles et logicielles liées aux applications d’IA embarquée depuis leur conception jusqu’à la démonstration de leur efficacité en situation réelle.
title: Maturation technologique et démonstration de solutions d’intelligence artificielle embarquée
description: Il se compose pour cela de deux volets distincts : Le déploiement de solutions basées sur l’IA embarquée dans des produits et procédés industriels de tous secteurs (volet A) et la maturation technologique d’architectures et plateformes matérielles dédiées à l’IA embarquée

scope: L’appel à projets « Espace de données mutualisées » a pour objectif de financer des espaces de données, lesquels permettent la mutualisation des données entre un grand nombre d’acteurs d’une ou plusieurs filières, incorporent des outils logiciels relatifs au partage des données et au traitement des données partagées, et disposent de structures de gouvernance des données assurant un haut niveau d’accessibilité, d’interopérabilité et de qualité des données.
title: Espace données mutualisées Accélération Cloud 2023

scope: La Misura intende agevolare e sostenere il rafforzamento delle filiere produttive e degli ecosistemi industriali regionali nelle catene globali del valore per accrescere, anche in coerenza con la strategia industriale UE, la capacità di innovazione, produzione e investimento delle imprese, in particolare PMI
title: MISURA PER IL RAFFORZAMENTO DELLE FILIERE PRODUTTIVE E DEGLI ECOSISTEMI INDUSTRIALI

scope: Support for Industrialisation of pilote stage projects
title: TATWIR R&D & Innovation Call #3
description:
"For industrial companies with a turnover >= 10MDHs (or a Forecast of 10MDHs for the next three years). Consortiums are eligible, as well as private/public collaborations. The call will be renewed for the next two years (2024-2025). For this first call, the costs are retroactive to the 14th of sept. 2022. 
The maximum budget/grant is for 24 months."

scope: Mejora de la eficiencia energética y uso de energías renovables en las instalaciones térmicas de calefacción, climatización, refrigeración, ventilación y agua caliente sanitaria, incluida la instalación de redes de calor y frio alimentadas por fuentes de energía renovable y/o calor residual para complejos turísticos de varios edificios.
title: Actuaciones de eficiencia energética y economía circular en empresas turísticas (PREE Turístico)

scope: To support Japanese companies to collaborate with ASEAN companies or agencies to use digital technologies to resolve social and economical issues in ASEAN countries and in Japan
title: ASEANにおけるアジアDX促進事業 Program for Digital Transformation in Asia - ASEAN

scope: To support the groundbreaking efforts of companies aiming to bring innovations by implementing of technology seeds from the research results of universities and other institutes

description: Companies in the medical industry cannot apply.

description: Supporting the collaboration between local authorities and SMEs to solve issues that are common in some regions and profit at the same time
